price: 68. Rabbigaana (Alle) wuxuu abuuraa wuxuu doono oo doortaa, ma leh iyaguse doorashada. Wuu ka hufan yahay Alle (ceeb iyo nuqsaan) oo ka Sarreeyaa waxay la wadaajiyaan cibaadada.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيَخۡتَارُۗ مَا كَانَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yakhluqu mā yashāu wayakhtāru mā kāna lahumu al-khiyaratu sub'ḥāna al-lahi wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
